Review Text: Kebetulan saya member Accor sehingga kemanapun saya pergi selalu mencari hotel di grup Accor untuk tempat menginap. Minggu lalu sengaja saya pilih Ibis Styles untuk menginap 3 malam. Hotel ini sangat strategis, dekat dari keramaian Malioboro tetapi cukup ada jarak sehingga tetap terasa tenang. Semua kebutuhan traveler tersedia di jarak sangat dekat dari hotel. Mart, makan, laundry, masjid, oleh-oleh dll. Pelayanan sangat ramah dan cekatan. Mulai dari reception, restoran, bar di rooftop, dan housekeeping semua hampir sempurna. Menu untuk breakfastnya cukup bervariasi dan enak-enak. Roof top barnya juga menjadi tempat menyenangkan untuk bersantai. Singkatnya, apa yang ditawarkan dan diberikan hotel ini sangat sesuai dengan harga yang saya bayar, bahkan bisa dibilang murah. Bicara peningkatan layanan, mungkin untuk kedepan bisa dilakukan upgrading layanan entertainment di kamar (TV). Dua jempol saya untuk Ibis Styles Yogyakarta dan para staffnya.

Review Text: I‚Äôve stayed at Ibis Styles in several countries and always had better experiences, so I was expecting the same here unfortunately this stay was quite disappointing. We booked two nights, and I‚Äôm glad it wasn‚Äôt longer. The room was not clean and had a constant, strong damp smell. There was no source of fresh air ,the air conditioning was working but didn‚Äôt refresh the air, which made the musty smell even worse. The bathroom floor became completely flooded after a shower, making it dangerously slippery. On a positive note, the reception staff were very polite and kind. With better cleanliness, ventilation, and maintenance, this hotel could offer a much better experience!!!!!

Review Text: Sebenarnya Hotelnya bagus, mewah, interiornya bagus estetik, lokasi strategis di jalan Dagen Malioboro. Ke Malioboro tinggal jalan kaki saja bisa. Hanya saja saya datang sudah sore jam 17.00 WIB (5 sore) kondisi dari perjalanan jauh sampai hotel harapannya langsung bisa ke kamar karena bareng keluarga ada orangtua juga, tetapi kamar belum siap padahal sudah sore. Kata resepsionisnya masih disiapkan karena ada request twin bed dijadikan satu, padahal saya bebas klo twin jg gapapa. Walaupun misal ada requestan seperti itu, harusnya sudah disiapkan sebelum jam 14.00 WIB. Kalau pengunjung kan checkout jam 12.00 WIB, ada rentang waktu 2 jam untup membereskan/merapihkan. Kalau pengunjung telat checkout didenda, ini pengunjung suruh nunggu sekitar hampir 1 jam kamar disiapkan tapi pihak Hotel ngga di denda / ngga kena punishment apa-apa. Sudah nunggu lama baru masuk kamar maghrib, kondisi sudah lelah mau depatpun percuma pihak hotel gamau disalahkan. Kalau saya nunggu masih bisa, tp ada orangtua yg pengen sampai langsung istirahat malah masih disuruh nunggu. Sekelas Ibis Hotel saya kira pelayanannya cepat tetapi kenyataannya seperti ini. Semoga hanya saya saja yg mengalami. Selain itu juga masuk kamar hotel untuk perlengkapan sikat gigi hanya satu, handuk 2, dan sandal hotel cuma 1. Padahal 1 kamar untuk 2 orang. Kamarnya tergolong bagus lengkap ada kulkas mininya, untuk minum disediakam botol kaca dan air minum mengambil air galon di depan kamar setiap lorong sekarang tersedia air galon mineral katanya untuk mengurangi sampah plastik. Kolam renangnya bagus di lantai 7 pemandangannya juga bagusüëç Saya pesan 3 kamar untuk keluarga lumayan di hari weekend dan libur sekolah dengan harga 700rb /kamar. Dapat sarapan tiap kamar 2 orang. Makanannya enak dan variatif banyak macamnya, minumannya juga ada beberapa macam üëç Harapannya sekelas Hotel Ibis semuanya bagus jadi saya sekeluarga percaya dengan hotel ini yg sudah terkenal dimana-mana. Tetapi pas ndilalah waktu itu weekend untuk pelayanan dan kesiapan kamar yg harus diperhatikan lagi untuk lebih siap. Supaya tidak ada pengunjung lain yg nasibnya seperti saya. Terimakasih

Review Text: Menginap 3 malam di hotel ini. Staff ramah helpfull. Awalnya 2 malam, akhirnya tambah 1 malam, krn kamar queenbed nya habis jd nya harus pindah kamar ke twin, tapi bisa di satukan bed nya. Sandal cuma dapat sepasang, sikat gigi juga cuma dapat 1 (untungnya klo pergi pergi selalu bawa alat mandi sendiri). Malam ke 3 dpt kamar yg air di kamar mandinya kurang begitu hangat. Kendala di tv tdk bisa connect wifi tapi, teknisi nya langsung datang. Sarapan enak, cuma menu kurang variatif. Deket klo mo ke mallioboro. Banyak tempat makan juga di sekitar hotel. Becak juga banyak yg standby di deket hotel. Anak anak minta berenang pagi jam 6 masih sepi dan airnya dingin. Overall baik.

Review Text: Dirty and shabby rooms, non-existent staff. Don't expect a doorman to be present at any time. The hotel seems to cater mainly to village people who may be easily impressed. The hotel only accepts cashless payments. One of the toilets was absolutely filthy and stunk badly. I've attached images below. The carpet in the hallways also stunk of mildew. The bathroom faucets were damaged and badly needed replacing. The drain in one of the showers didn't work properly and so the floor was slippery and wet all of the time. Review Text: Datang kesini bareng keluarga buat liburan, hotelnya bagus dan pelayanan ramah. Kamar bersih, view ke luar bagus pemandangan kota jogja. Review Text: Hotel Ibis yang letaknya di dekat Malioboro, Jalan kaki sekitar 5 menitan sampai. Kamar di sini cukup lega, amenitis aman walau kulit gatal-gatal. Pelayanan juga cukup baik, kebetulan booking untuk kamar yang tersedia hanya twin bed tapi bisa dijadikan 1. Makanan di sini variatif menunya dan harga di menu juga masih murah walau tertagihnya malah jauh dari harga menu. Pesan bakso gajah 30rb ketagih sampai 85rb, apa karena jadi member Accor atau memang harganya sekarang segitu? Perlu diperbaiki lagi. Fasilitas di sini cukup lengkap, parkiran basement dan ada rooftop juga bisa sambil medang dan nyawang pemandangan kota Jogja dari atas.

Review Text: Menginap disini untuk tujuan kegiatan kantor dan rombongan sebanyak 2 bue atau sekitar 80 orang. Parah lama banget pelayanan checkin nya! Nunggu bisa sampe 2 jam baru siap kamarnya. Posisi lapar dan lelah jadi makin bikin kesel dan pingin review service dengan bintang 3 dari 5 sajaüôè Padahal selain pelayanan yang lama saat checkin, menurutku hotel ini sangat perfect dan excelent dari segi kebersihan kamar, akses jalan, makanan resto, wifi dan apalagi sangat dengan dengan Malioboro baik diakses dengan jalan kaki maupun kendaraam bermotor, ini nilai plus banget sih. Parkir bus bisa untuk 2 bus. Ruang tunggu dan lobby juga lumayan luas, nyaman, toilet umumnya juga bersih dan wangi banget. Rooftop dan barnya jadi nilai plus lagi, karena dapat bgt city viewnya. Swimming poolnya juga bersih airnya.

Review Text: (REVIEW JUJUR) Saya awal masuk (Malem jam 9) hotel bener-bener gak disambut/diarahin langsung jalan parkir sama satpam, mereka malah fokus main hp. Apalagi satpamnya jg pakai TWS jadi dipanggil2 bener2 gak denger. Terus, satpam ini jg bener2 gak ada ramah-ramahnya sama sekali. Saya kemarin lupa kunci stang motor karena bener-bener buru-buru ada sesuatu yang mengharuskan saya kekamar dan itu cuma 30-45 menitan terus saya keluar lagi. Saya juga bilang sama satpamnya (Maaf saya mengakui salah, karena kondisi saya yang buru-buru) padahal semalam pas saya nginep gak saya kunci stang. Tapi bener-bener muka satpamnya gak ada ramah2nya sama sekali dan tatapan matanya bener-bener tajam banget ke saya. Saya tau anda capek kerja, tapi anda bisa lebih ramah lagi ke konsumen. Saya bener-bener gak mood banget saat itu. Masak kalah sama tukang bersih2 kamar hotel yang ramahnya bener2 kebangetan. Mungkin bisa di evaluasi lagi tu satpam2 sini, dan sepertinya saya bakal skip nginep disini lagi. Cuma untuk review jujurnya, hotel ini bener2 nyaman. Cuma lantainya masih ada yang kotor kayak bekas air tumpah atau kaki orang. Toiletnya bagus, cuma pemanas airnya kadang error. Jadi pas saya pengen mandi air anget lebih sering keluar air dinginnya. Aku suka banget disini karena Acnya dingin banget sebab pake ac central. Tapi remotnya gabisa dibawa karena permanen nancep di didinding. Cara ngaturnya jg mudah. Wifinya kenceng tapi belom support wifi 6. Buat rapat zoom gak ada kendala, download aplikasi jg kenceng. Kasur, bantal, selimutnya bersih dan wangi. Gak ada rambut tertinggal di bednya. Kwkw beber2 bersih. Breakfastnya lauknya enak2 semua. Bisa goreng telur dadakan jg üòÅ wajib dicoba. Ada omlet, kromboloni, leker, dsbnya. Lauk beratnya juga banyak, ada ayam, nasgor, sayur, soto, jamu, puding, roti, dsbnya. Ada ada yang self service bukin makanannya sendiri. Kayak roti bakar, soto, dsbnya. Disini jug ada kolam renangnya, airnya bener2 seger banget dan gaj mau kaporit. Kalau renang saran jam 5 pagi. Itu bener2 enak banget üòÅ

Review Text: I recently stayed at Ibis Hotel in Yogyakarta and would like to share my experience through this review: Positive Points: 1. Strategic Location: The hotel is conveniently located, just a 5-minute walk to the Malioboro Area, making it easily accessible by foot. However, navigating by car can be cumbersome due to the one-way road system. 2. Spacious Rooms: The rooms are impressively spacious, providing ample room for guests. 3. Helpful Staff: The hotel staff proved to be helpful and responsive to requests throughout the stay. 4. Great Rooftop Bar and Pool: The rooftop bar and swimming pool offer a delightful experience, adding a positive touch to the overall ambiance. Negative Points: 1. Room Cleanliness Issues: The initial room cleanliness left much to be desired, with dirt from the AC on the floor, smelly towels, and a moldy bathroom. It gave the impression that the maintenance was lacking. 2. High Price for Standard Facilities: During the peak season on 26-27 Dec, the pricing seemed disproportionately high for the standard facilities offered, raising concerns about value for money. 3. Limited Breakfast Options: The breakfast options were disappointingly limited, which may not align with guests' expectations. Conclusion: Unfortunately, my stay at Ibis Hotel Yogyakarta was marred by cleanliness issues, high pricing for basic facilities, and limited breakfast choices. Considering the nearby alternatives with better facilities at more affordable rates, I would not recommend this hotel for future stays.

Review Text: Lokasi ga terlalu jauh dari Malioboro. Tempat parkir mobil ga terlalu luas, tapi klo parkiran penuh, bisa valet parking jadi ga usah repot. Pegawainya hampir semuanya ramah, terutama securitynya. Aq dapet kamar di lantai 4. Interior kamar bagus, cukup luas, ada kulkas mini 'n coffee maker. Breakfast enak 'n menu cukup beragam (bubur ayam, soto, omelet, nasi goreng, oseng buncis wortel jagung, opor, mie, gorengan mendoan + bakwan sayur, pancake, waffle, roti, jamu, jus jambu, teh, kopi, air putih, infused water). Begitu makanan qta habis, piring kotor langsung diambil (cekatan). Kolam renang di rooftop bagus. Ada sky barnya klo malem. Kenapa aq cuma kasih bintang 4 & bukan 5? Karna hotel ini punya beberapa kekurangan : suara antar kamar ga kedap, dari lantai 4 klo malem juga masih terdengar suara motor lewat, hairdryer di kamar mandi rusak jadi pas mo make ga bisa, sprei kasur aga kotor, kamar mandi 'n closet juga ga terlalu bersih. Saran aja : mungkin klo tuk bikin kamar jadi kedap suara terlalu banyak biaya, jadi ga usah diperbaiki ga apa. Tapi, klo untuk kebersihan harap diperhatikan 'n ditingkatkan lagi.

Review Text: Kesan pertama di hotel ini, wow bagus banget. Apalagi pelayanan resepsionis sampai satpamnya ramah. Meski ada kendala pas checkin, enggak bikin kecewa. Cuma kasian tamu lain jadi antree. Cuma ada 2 resepsionis aja. Padahal waktu seperti weekend jelas padat tamu hotel. Kesan kedua liat kamar, oke banget. Epic lah. Pas masuk pengaturan cahaya dan furniture serasi banget. Hanya kurang nyaman, liat kloset kotor, seperti bekas noda hitam. Kurang terawat. Belum lagi selimut bikin gatal. Alhasil tidur enggak selimutan. Dan kamar kurang kedap suara. Kalau ada orang buka pintu kamar, apalagi kalau kamar sebelah diketok, pasti kedenger. Suara orang di koridor jg kedenger. Sangat enggak nyaman. Kesan ketiga, view skybar luar biasa! Banyak titik spot foto di rooftop yg merupakan skybar dan pool. Cuma lagi lagi, hatihati kalau mau foto di sudut rooftop ini. Banyak jebakan batman. Kayunya rusak, hatihati terperosok. Sepertinya emang disuruh foto di kursi yg tersedia atau di kolam. Semoga bisa berbenah yaaaa. Melihat nama hotelnya aja bagus, masa fasilitas tidak dibenahi. Salam.

Biaya buat minta selimut & bantal tambahan pun mahal. Sarapan biasa saja, padahal untuk hotel sekelas ini saya sering dapat sarapan yang beragam dan bisa ambil sendiri. Mohon untuk pihak hotel bisa cek fasilitas yg ada dan segera diperbaiki.

Review Text: Kind and good personal, and nice restaurant. However the room was dirty, stains in the bed, all walls were dirty and looked like they has been like that for months (touching and scratching was enough to remove some) Floor was also dirty. All the room was incredibly humid. The smell was awful because of that and there were humid stains all over the room as well. The first day they didn't even put soap. After complaining to our agency they cleaned a bit better the day after, however the humidity made it so difficult to stay(actually is bad for health). There were other details and the room lacks for maintainance in general (TV not properly connected, etc) I would say at least work on the humidity, do not let people sleep with it.

Review Text: Great budget hotel in heart of Yogyakarta. Located in walk distance to Malioboro and Tugu train station. Owned by Accor, an hotel chain operating internationally, this hotel has a four star standard. Service was good, but some parts of the hotel are old enough and need to be restored or changed. Breakfast was okay, with some choices of indonesian and western food, and some standard breakfast things like eggs, milks, teas, porridges, coffees, fruits, and pastries. Room was fine, not too spacious and not too cramped, but nothing extraordinary either. They provide free parking, there is a basement parking, with a capacity of 15 cars and 30 motorbikes. Rooftop pool is good, with a nice view to the city, but again, some parts of this hotel need to be renovated i think. Considering the price (around 400k rupiah), it is worth the price, but don't expect too much

Review Text: Terima kasih Ibis Styles Yogyakarta... pengalaman menginap 8 malam bersama anak saya di Ibis Styles Yogyakarta di masa pandemi ini sangat menyenangkan dan tidak mengurangi kualitas pelayanan dari Ibis Styles Yogyakarta. Dengan layout kamar yg bagus, bersih, dan tempat tidur yg empuk membuat istirahat semakin nyaman. Dan ternyata setelah diperhatikan, termyata setiap kamar di hotel ini memilik jendela yg dapat melihat suasana luar ruangan, sehingga tidak terkesan dalam ruangan tertutup. Keramahan staf di front office dan area breakfast semakin menambah kenyamanan, ditambah dengan suasana area breakfast yg betah untuk berlama-lama serta menu breakfast yg variatif menambah kesan tersendiri bagi kami. Dan pemberlakuan protokol kesehatan selama di area hotel membuat kami semakin merasa aman. Sangat rekomendasi untuk kami menginap kembali di Ibis Styles Yogyakarta.. dan rekomendasi juga untuk wisatawan lokal dan mancanegara.. Thank you untuk Manajemen Hotel dan Staf Ibis Styles Yogyakarta...

See you next time

Review Text: Good hotel's location, especially if you're travelling with your own car because we can reach the hotel through Jl. Jogonegaran, no need to drive through Jl. Dagen. Another good news is the hotel provided basement parking area and its not too far if you want to take a walk to Jl. Malioboro. We stayed in superior room on 2nd floor. The room were good enough, it has refrigerator and hair dryer, the bed linens and the towels were clean. But on the first night, I was awakened at 4.30 am by a quiet loud sound of a mosque arounds. Considering with the price that we payed, the breakfast was a little bit dissapointed. The taste were ok, not too bad-not too good. But it could be better if they have more menu variations. We also have to pay the breakfast for 5 years old++ kids.

Review Text: Dari sekian banyak hotel di Yogya, menurut saya hotel Ibis Styles dapat menjadi salah satu pertimbangan bila mencari tempat penginapan strategis ke pusat hiburan jalan Malioboro di Yogyakarta namun tidak ingin terganggu suasana hiruk pikuk keramaian di sana. Dari lokasinya, untuk pergi berjalan kaki ke jalan Malioboro cukup dekat bila terbiasa jalan kaki, namun jika malas bisa naik becak yang biasa mangkal di depan hotel. Bila membutuhkan kendaraan untuk berpergian, hotel menyediakan penyewaan mobil sesuai dengan kebutuhan. Secara umum suasana cukup nyaman. Ada hiburan live music pada malam hari di bagian atap hotel bagi yang ingin suasana santai sambil menghabiskan waktu diluar ruangan. Pilihan kamar tersedia berbagai macam tipe dengan fasilitas standar pada umumnya hotel. Menu sarapan cukup lengkap dengan berbagai pilihan menu. Area tunggu dan bersantai di lobby pun cukup luas. Kalaupun ada kekurangan bagi saya adalah area parkir yang sangat terbatas. Jadi jika membawa rombongan keluarga dengan beberapa mobil khawatir tidak cukup.

Review Text: Meski bintang 3, hotel ini menawarkan paket cukup lengkap buat traveler yang lagi singgah di Yogyakarta. Lokasinya dekat dengan Malioboro, bisa ditempuh dengan jalan kaki sekitar 300an meter maupun naik becak. Selain Malioboro, lokasi hotel ini juga cukup terjangkau dengan lokasi wisata lain seperti kraton, alun-alun utara, titik nol, dan stasiun Tugu. Kamarnya cukup nyaman dengan interior dominasi warna-warna muda yang cerah dan berani. Demikian juga dengan warna dan motif karpet di lorong kamar-kamar yang instagramable. Mengusung kampanye lingkungan hijau bertema Planet 21, hotel ini mengajak tamunya antara lain untuk mengurangi sampah plastik, menghemat frekuensi laundry handuk, dan sebagainya. Ada taman vertikal dengan beragam tanaman bebungaan di resto bar di lantai 1 dan sering dijadikan spot foto para tamu. Ada juga sky bar di roof top yang buka mulai jam 10 pagi sampai jam 12 malem. Di sini kamu bisa nongkrong sambil berburu sunset kota Jogja plus berenang. Sebaiknya kalau ke roof top sky bar sore jelang sunset, soalnya kalau siang panas banget. Untuk menu breakfast, meski tak selengkap hotel bintang 4 atau 5, namun rasanya nendang. Paling suka sama kentang dan pancakenya.

Untuk menu breakfast, meski tak selengkap hotel bintang 4 atau 5, namun rasanya nendang. Paling suka sama kentang dan pancakenya.

Review Text: This hotel is closed to train station only 15 minutes by walking distance, When we arrived around 3 pm my rooms only ready one and another one was not ready so that we decided to stay at skybar at 7 pm while waiting another room key. The rooms is so quite big and clean, there is a cute dog towels on the bed, the view is not bad and also this hotel was close to culinary, traditional market, gift shop and many more just by walking distance. The breakfast was average taste and also lack of variety food. I spent 3 days 2 nights here and overall was good. Thanks...

Review Text: A Singaporean‚Äôs perspective. Stay was during Ramadan period. Rooms are very dated, especially the bathrooms. But they are upgrading I hear. For the price, I personally think Neo hotel is much better value. Best part about the hotel is the bedding which was comfortable (if you prefer the softer beds and pillows). I found the Buffet breakfast to be disappointing for the basic items like bread and jam. Only creamers provides for coffee. Buffet spread was decent nonetheless. Wifi is decent but was intermittent at times. Some staff spoke decent English, while some found it difficult to communicate with me. Decent services though. Rooftop bar is rather empty. But having a bar itself within the hotel is a bonus in this city. This is a 2.5 star hotel at best, but I expected more from the Ibis chain which I have stayed at other locations and found to be fine.

Review Text: To drive your car to the front door and/or to the hotel parking, you actually have to drive against traffic into a one-way road. The parking garage is tiny and you may be asked to leave your key so they can move your car around (town?). Rooms are simple and are in need of renovation. Top pool bar service..... Big hassle to pay by card there and not a very complete menu of alcoholic beverages. Or ingredients are not at hand. Very mediocre hotel; there are better ones around Malioboro at similar cost. Breakfast is okay and my early morning was brightened up by one very lovely service-minded waitress arranging real coffee. Ask; they do have an espresso machine......

Review Text: In this Ibis Style, I stay 1 day. Before entering this hotel, it looks luxurious and magnificent because compared to its small buildings. Plus the blue lights are flickering. Well, when I come in there is no one who opens the door (doorman), no one brought a big bag, no welcome drink. This I came around at 8 pm. When entering the room, I get a note welcome .. But .. the name of the note, not my husband as a guest room hotel .. When I take a tissue box, just 4 sheets. When I want to take toilet paper, ooh no. Very dirty. I was so disgusted. Bathroom floor is very slippery, my son fell twice because slippery. In the room is only 1 available electric socket. Beside the bed is also not there. For breakfast, standard menu as at other hotels. But when i needed something, the service from the hotel is very nice, quick and solves. Location of strategic hotel, in the middle of the city. Near road malioboro. Around the hotel are many shops, many pedicap, public vehicles are easy to find (such as go-car, grab, taxi). The rooms are quite spacious, the view from the rooms is directly to the street. Its lobby is unix, comfortable, spacious, the receptionist is friendly, there is a child's play area. So, with the price that much I get in the room is not worth it.

Review Text: Maaf sebelumnya, saya review secara jujur dan bisa jadi pertimbangan evaluasi buat kedepannya agar tidak terulang lagi, diperbaiki. Dari saya sendiri cukup kecewa, dari segi fasilitas yang ditawarkan kurang sekali, semisal Hair Dryer tidak berfungsi, toilet mudah banget bau sekali, lantai kamar banyak kotornya, entah saya yang kebetulan zonk atau bagaimana, kalau dari segi harga yang ditawarkan dengan yang saya rasakan sangat amat kurang bahkan bisa dikatakan kecewa, besar harapan bisa jadi evaluasi internal kedepannya buat pihak hotel ya :), bahkan penginapan tidak berbintang yang pernah saya tinggali, lebih bagus experincenya yang saya rasakan, ini buat kemajuan ibis supaya jauh lebih baik ya!‚ù§Ô∏è terlepas segala evaluasi dari saya, tapi saya sangat apresiasi dan luar biasa untuk kualitas rasa dari masakan yang dihadirkan sangat enak sekali sangat sempurna untuk masakannya terima kasih, pertahankan untuk masakannya yaa!

Review Text: It's an old hotel, so one of the bad ibis styles (others are newer). And with lack of guests, it's so gloomy, the service is below standard, no Accor level of grooming. Felt like entering and served by an old hotel place with clunky receptionist. Noone is around but that boy. Parking is so troublesome, you need to call to get help opening the access to the hotel!! And as it's a gloomy with no guests, no activities, no food service at night. No welcome drink too if you arrived late. Room is ok, not the cleanest. But they have the welcoming gift is a pro. Location is not bad. But with the price, we expect a better standard. It's not a value for money (as you expect from an ibis styles). I am here as a member, otherwise would definitely go to other hotels. Not recommended. I asked the desk on the extended price, they replied with a normal standard rate (not following the previous ones with the member rate). I guess they need more training. Compared to those ibis styles with better team, this one is below the standard.

Review Text: Menikmati tempat menginap yang nyaman, Restoran di lantai dasar yang menjadikan suasana santai dan ringan, Ruang meeting yang memadai dengan fasilitas wifi dg sinyal kuat. Disertai para penerima tamu yang ramah dan rendah hati. Akses ke tempat jalan-jalan paling favorit di Yogyakarta Malioboro sangat deket cukup jalan kaki sampai sambil menikah.ati kepadatan penduduk yang kreatif dengan berbagai home industri dan kuliner khas Yogyakarta. Malam hari bisa kongkow ngobrol di angkringan sederhana tapi nyaman. Pada lantai 7 terdapat kolam renang yg dilengkapi dengan mini bar dan resto Sky Bar yang bisa menghangatkan tubuh sehabis nyemplung dinginnya air kolam. Ngopi ??? Review Text: Good Value for money hotel. Really good location in Malioboro, near the shopping district and provides easy access to any part of the city easily. The rooms are basic, clean, furnishings are again fairly standard for a budget hotel. The service staff is helpful, though language can be an issue since not everybody is ok with English. But at that price you cant ask more. I would suggest you stay here if you are looking for a decent quality budget hotel in the right location in Jogja.

Review Text: Menginap di Ibis Styles selama 4 hari 3 malam selama perjalanan di Jogja. Pesan kamar dengan connecting door, karena memang pergi rombongan (ketersediaan kamar dengan connecting door bisa ditanyakan langsung). Begitu datang dapat welcome drink. Sarapannya cukup lengkap, selama masa pandemi sarapannya tetap all you can eat, tapi diambilkan oleh petugas restoran di hotelnya. Masuk lobby disediakan wastafel untuk cuci tangan. Review Text: I arrived at Ibis Styles Yogyakarta around 11ish PM and I've already sent an email before notifying the hotel I will be arriving late. Check in was quick and efficient. When I entered the room they already insert an access card into the main power outlet and the light and air conditioner were already turned on. The room I got was a corner room, maybe that's why it was kind of bigger. The bed was comfortable, all basic facilities; flat screen tv, safe deposit box, mini refrigerator were provided. Bathroom was decent also. Nothing to complain about the room except that there were no electric power outlets on neither side of the bed. So you can not charge any gadgets within hand reach while you're lying on the bed. Breakfast buffet was pleasant, quite a lot of varieties. My personal favourites were the pastries and jamu beras kencur. I also tried the room service. All items in the menu were reasonably priced, quite affordable for a hotel. Randomly picked the Rawon and orange juice, cost me under Rp. 100.000 There are swimming pool, bar and spa on the rooftop. Quiet a cool place to swim, have a drink and some light bites. Too bad I only had time to swim for a while. Overall, I really enjoyed my stay. There's a masjid right a cross the hotel, so Muslim guests can perform mandatory daily prayers there. Definitely ibis styles Yogyakarta will be on my priority hotel chose next time I visit the city.

Review Text: Kamarnya bersih, tapi wifinya lemot bgt. Akan lebih nyaman jika ditambah karpet. Utk breakfast makanannya lumayan variatif dan enak. Sepertinya para staff hotel butuh ditraining kembali karena kurang friendly dan kurang cekatan pada customer. Disana pun tidak ada bellboy yg bisa menyapa dan mengarahkan customer. Review Text: I recently had the pleasure of staying at Ibis Styles Yogyakarta, and despite a few minor drawbacks, the outstanding service provided by the staff left an indelible impression on me. Situated in the heart of Yogyakarta's Malioboro area, the hotel's location is undeniably strategic for tourists. However, it's worth noting that the hotel's signage could use improvement. The darkened sign at night and the lack of visible road markings make finding the entrance a bit challenging, especially since the small hotel signage isn't very noticeable. Additionally, some of the amenities, such as the aging TV and the overall ambiance, reflect the hotel's age. Despite these minor drawbacks, the real highlight of my stay was the exceptional service provided by the hotel staff. The reservation team went above and beyond to accommodate my last-minute requests. The Guest Service Agents (GSAs) during check-in, particularly Ms. Ayu, exemplified Javanese hospitality with warm greetings and effective communication. The concierge / bellman, including Mr. Panji, Mr. Rizal, and Mr. Kiki, demonstrated a high level of professionalism. From assisting with luggage to catering to my needs during the stay, their dedication to providing excellent service was evident. Special mention goes to Mr. Ragil for his politeness while delivering the welcome amenity and snacks‚Äîa true reflection of Javanese hospitality. What truly sets Ibis Styles Yogyakarta apart is the staff's commitment to delivering a 5-star experience despite being a 3-star hotel. The exceptional service provided by the team, from the reservation desk to the front desk, exceeded my expectations. I feel compelled to share this positive experience not only in the google review but also with the corporate and brand representatives. The hospitality of the staff at Ibis Styles Yogyakarta is truly top-notch. Mr. Faris and Ms. Ani from front desk were incredibly helpful when I accidentally locked myself out of my room, promptly responding and assisting me in a professional and efficient manner. The reservation team was also highly responsive and accommodating to my last-minute requests, and I was delighted with the upgraded room that exceeded my expectations. These excellent customer service interactions are a testament to the hotel's commitment to delivering a memorable and positive experience for their guests. I sincerely hope that this review serves as a testament to the great and exceptional teams at Ibis Styles Yogyakarta. It is a shining example of how the hospitality industry should operate, and I look forward to experiencing their outstanding service again in the future.

Review Text: Saat menginap saya dikasih kamar di lantai 6. Beda 1 lantai dengan skybar rooftop, namun sama sekali tidak terdengar bising di kamar. Overall suka nginap disini. Anakku suka, mama saya juga suka. Katanya kalau ke jogja, pingin nginap disini lagi. Yang minus dari kamar adalah banyak semut. Baru naruh makanan sebentar di meja, semut langsung banyk datang. Terus handuk juga pinggirannya gripis-gripis. Harusnya yang seperti itu sudah waktunya diganti. Kemarin lupa menyampaikan keluhan handuk ini ke resepsionis. Kemudian, untuk menu makanan kurang sekali sayuran hijau. Tapi pilihan menunya beragam seperti ada nasi kuning, soto, bubur, dll. Rasanya juga lumayan. Lalu di dekat pintu masuk juga ada travel agen yang stand by disitu. Jadi kita tidak perlu bingung buat yg pingin menjelajah jogja dan sekitarnya. Trus untuk rooftop, ada kolam renang nya, ada cafe nya mulai sore, ada tempat duduk dg view yang bagus. Bisa sering ngliat pesawat yg msh terbang rendah. Buat spot foto, keren lah.

The menu is just suitable for a budget hotel but it could be better.

Review Text: Lokasinya cukup dekat dari Malioboro. Kalau malam, hotel ini mempunyai lampu yang menarik. Seperti hujan cahaya led. Salah satu daya tariknya adalah adanya bar di roof top(sky bar). Juga ada kolam renangnya. Ada live musik malam mulai 20.30. Bisa melihat matahari tenggelam jika cuaca cerah. Tempatnya romantis untuk menghabiskan waktu dengan orang yang disayangi. Sambil menikmati matahari tenggelam, juga tersedia menu sun set hour. Menu sun set hour terdiri dari menu western. Dengan konsep free flow, sehingga bisa puas menikmati menu yang ada. Yang jelas tempatnya instagramable.

Review Text: This is my 5th stay here at this hotel. Love to location related to the railway station. Only a 10minute walk. Staff are as usual very friendly. Room is slowly deteriorating. Floor is getting loose. Breakfast items running out fast without being replenished. I think twice before returning to this Ibis styles hotel. I guess it was a lack of maintenance during covid closure. After making up room; no more nicely folded 'swan' or 'turtle' towels on the bed.

Review Text: Fasilitas lengkap, ada rooftop dan kolam renang. Untuk parkir basement cukup baik untuk space yang mini, karena di kelola dengan baik oleh sekuriti. Hanya saja karena lebar jalan dan tikungan yang cukup tajam, membuat anda yang membawa mobil pribadi waspada agar jangan sampai tergores. Menu makanan resto enak untuk ukuran hotel yang biasanya hambar. So far rekomended untuk menggunakan jasa kendaraan umum untuk ke lokasi karena daerah sepanjang jalan adalah jalur sangat padat apalagi pas liburan sekolah dan weekend. Satu lagi, usahakan meminimalisasi penggunaan GPS, karena jalan-jalan di jogja kecil dan banyak gang yang sempit.

Review Text: The hotel is very stylish and conveniently located close to malioboro and a short walk to the Kraton and the nice things to see in Yogyakarta. Rooms are very nice, clean, super comfortable bed, nice staff. Just the breakfast for the sweet side was a bit disappointing, but nothing important. The roof bar with swimming pool is very beautiful and it was nice to end the day with a cocktail at reasonable prices. I would definitely come back.

Review Text: The staffs are nice but overall I'm disappointed staying at Ibis Styles. The bed sheets smell, the bathroom is dirty and slippery, the drainage in the shower is not good enough so it will flooded. There is a slight dirt on the wall as you can see in the picture. The amenities are so-so. We asked for additional water bottles in the afternoon but they didn't come until we call again at night. There was someone at our floor definitely smoke when they actually couldn't. Our stay was terrible! Had to go out from there on 2nd night; even though we're supposed to stay there for 4 nights...Won't stay here again for sure.

Review Text: Located near Malioboro, easy acces to food place and gifts. A cozy room with good facilites. I enjoy my stay here for 3 days in a row. But because its located inside public area, they not have such a good view. The view rather street or other visitor room. So its not really comfort for women with hijab. We cant open our window freely. Because people will see us easily from street or other room. The toilet at 2nd floor conference and meeting area is dirty and smelly. Toilet paper scattered on the floor like its not cleaned regularly. The mosque too is to tiny. Last, the fruits. Its not fresh fruits that served on the table. Hope you can pay attention to the customer health first besides the efficiency. Hope the services get better, thank you.

Review Text: Terlalu Sempurna, jika aku memberi Rating 5. Kenapa???? Saat aku check-in kan datang jam 2 siang. Nah di hari itu tanggal 10 November 2019. Menginap lah aku di hotel ini. Aku datang jam 2 siang. Sebenarnya kan sudah bisa masuk kamar. Eh... Eh.... Saat check-in tiba. Aku menunggu lama untuk kamar yang sedang disiapkan, nah dari situ mulailah aku kesal, karena aku harus menunggu 3 jam untuk menunggu kamar yang sedang disiapkan. Bayangkan selama 3 jam, aku beserta keluarga ku harus menunggu lama di Lobby untuk menunggu kamar yang sedang disiapkan. HALLO EMANG GAK ADA KAMAR YANG LAIN??? Udah si masalah itu aja yang aku sesalkan dari Manajemen hotel ini. Selebihnya sudah cukup baik sih. Sekian Review Jujur dari aku.

Review Text: ibis Styles Yogyakarta terletak tepat di jantung Kota Yogyakarta, 5 menit berjalan kaki dari jalan Malioboro. Datang dan nikmati pizza tipis nan krispi yang istimewa hanya di Streats Resto dengan fasilitas koneksi WiFi gratis, manjakan diri Anda di Seasons Spa, ajak putra putri Anda bermain di Cocon Kids Club dan rasakan koktail di rooftop D'SkyBar. Sangat cocok untuk liburan akhir pekan Anda, pilihan yang tepat berkumpul dengan keluarga, dan hotel ini juga menyediakan kebutuhan berbisnis Anda. Di lantai 7, di roof top ada D'Sky bar, tempat ini salah satu tempat yang bagus untuk menikmati sunset di tengah kota jogja. Di roof top ini juga ada kolam renang
